ygData.subject: A second arrival
ygData.msgSnippet: The damaged stasis pod loomed in the sky as it hurtled towards the fast approaching ground, the large metal coffin struck with the sound of a thunderclap,

The damaged stasis pod loomed in the sky as it hurtled towards the 
fast approaching ground, the large metal coffin struck with the sound 
of a thunderclap, sending bamboo trees and dirt flying into the air 
as the metallic pod dug a deep gouge in the earth before coming to 
rest against a solid boulder half submerged in dirt.

Even as the dna sequencer rose and began scanning the area for 
suitable alternate forms another section of the pod began emitting a 
distress beacon on all known frequencies. While the protoform within 
was undamaged physically pods reaction was one of distress just in 
case.

As the beacon continued to emit its message the sequencer locked onto 
a form and began working on converting the protoform. As time ticked 
on it's eyes snapped open and looked around, pushing slowly on the 
door to open it...
